```{r}
studentMajors <- factor(
  c("經濟系", "經濟系", "法律系")
)
```

```{r}
class(studentMajors)
```
```{r}
levels(studentMajors)
```
levels顯示的類別名稱（categorical values）順序整數值即R真正儲存的內容:

法律系會存成1; 經濟系會存成2。

```{r}
studentMajors
```

```{r}
typeof(studentMajors)
```
```{r}
as.integer(studentMajors)
```
factor -> integer
